description:
A brain-colony. Though unlike the mostly benign yet troublesome Leopard, Nerval is a malignant entity who seeks the enslavement of humanity. He is aided by a loyal movement of people known as the Nervalists. He takes the form of a yellow hair male and Takane recently serves as his guard. He however fears Leopard as Leopard is a very unpredictable character.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Nerval
